title: The Cerberus Rebellion
description: War changes everything.On the world of Zaria, Elves, magic and mythical beasts coexist beside rifles and railroads. The futures of two nations hang in the balance as rebels and revolutionaries trade gunfire with loyalists and tyrants.The King of Ansgar, secure in his belief that his loyal nobles and fearful subjects answer to his every whim, seeks to gain favor with friends across the sea. But his decision to send armies thousands of miles away will test that fear, and loyalty.In war, little is held back; in revolution, nothing is safeA Novel of approximately 93,000 words.
author: Joshua  Johnson
